author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HENRIETTE CONTINUES NORTHWESTWARD WELL TO THE NORTH OF HAWAII...
summary: ...HENRIETTE CONTINUES NORTHWESTWARD WELL TO THE NORTH OF HAWAII... As of 11:00 PM HST Sun Aug 10 the center of Henriette was located near 27.6, -155.0 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 990 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HENRIETTE CONTINUES NORTHWESTWARD WELL TO THE NORTH OF HAWAII... As of 11:00 PM HST Sun Aug 10 the center of Henriette was located near 27.6, -155.0 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 990 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Henriette (CP3/EP082025)
